data.title: We Need a Miracle by Charity Gayle
data.meta_description: Original Master MultiTracks, Charts, Patches, and instrument parts for rehearsal. View all products & resources available for "We Need a Miracle" by Charity Gayle
data.text:
Verse 1

You're the same God today

And the same God tomorrow

Help me see the victory

You already see

Let my faith be today

What it will be tomorrow

When I've seen the victory

You already see

Pre Chorus

Ohh

Jesus I believe ohh

Chorus

We need a miracle

You are the miracle maker

God of the impossible

There is no power greater

Exceeding abundant

Beyond what we

Could ask or think

We call on Your name Jesus

Verse 2

By the power of Your name

And all for Your glory

The sick are healed

The soul is filled

The battle has been won

On Your promise I stand

And in faith I believe it

That what I pray

In Your name

It's already done

Pre Chorus

Ohh

Let Your will be done ohh

Chorus

We need a miracle

You are the miracle maker

God of the impossible

There is no power greater

Exceeding abundant

Beyond what we

Could ask or think

We call on Your name Jesus

Bridge

In the waiting

You get the glory

In the healing

You get the glory

In the breaking

You get the glory

In the breakthrough

You get the glory

Refrain

You get the glory

You get the glory

You get the glory

You get the glory

Chorus

We need a miracle

You are the miracle maker

God of the impossible

There is no power greater

Exceeding abundant

Beyond what we

Could ask or think

We call on Your name

Tag

We call on Your name
